name: Vespertine
description:
Come along and plays as a pair of twins to compete in a local multiplayer challenge on who defeats the most foes with a one hit attack. 

This game is full of aesthetic graphics in pink and purple hues and perfect for a quick challenge.

Key features:

  • Local 2 Player co-op
  • Windows OS
  • Timer
  • Points
  • Splitscreen
  • Keyboard only controls
  • Instant Death
